text:
Title: May December (2023)
Director: Todd Haynes
Starring: Natalie Portman, Julianne Moore, Charles Melton, and more.
Genre: Drama, Romance
Runtime: 113 minutes
IMDb Rating: 7.1/10 (from 7,132,670 users)
Douban Score: ★★★✦☆

Plot Summary:
The film follows the story of Grace (Julianne Moore) and Joe (Charles Melton), a famous couple whose romantic tale was chronicled in tabloids for over twenty years after they fell in love when she was 25 and he was 40. Now, as they prepare to send their twin children off to college, Joe begins to confront the realities of his life. Meanwhile, actress Elizabethtown's Elizabeth Berry (Natalie Portman) is preparing for her role in a movie about Grace and Joe's relationship. To better understand her character, she decides to live with them. As the two women observe each other, similarities and differences between them begin to surface, while external pressures cause cracks in their family dynamics.

Awards:
- 76th Cannes Film Festival (Golden Palm nomination for Todd Haynes)
- 33rd Independent Spirit Awards (Best Supporting Male Performance nomination for Charles Melton, Best Screenplay nomination for Samy Burch)
